displayProperties.description: Return to Quinn to discuss the next steps.
displayProperties.name: Maelstrom

setData.questStepSummary:
"Well, well, looks like Maelstrom's work is connected to the Occlusion too! Come see me when you get a chance."
—Quinn

displayProperties.description: Visit Nimbus.
displayProperties.name: Bluejay

setData.questStepSummary: Nimbus can help you access Bluejay's old work.

displayProperties.description: Defeat combatants in the current Vex Incursion Zone with a Strand subclass equipped to obtain Shellcode Fragments, and open a Terminal Overload Key Chest to obtain a Polymorphic Engine.
displayProperties.name: Bluejay

setData.questStepSummary:
"Awesome! Now that you have the Vex encryption data, you'll need a Polymorphic Engine to brute force your way past their lockout."
—Nimbus

displayProperties.description: Complete the Partition activity.
displayProperties.name: Bluejay

setData.questStepSummary:
"Whole lotta Vex in this old sim. Not surprising, since Bluejay set this whole experiment up on the edge of the VexNet."
—Nimbus

displayProperties.description: Return to the Hall of Heroes to repair Bluejay's memorial.
displayProperties.name: Bluejay

setData.questStepSummary: A Bluejay is a pest and a problem-solver, but whatever it does, it does with style. You can feel this Cloud Strider's legacy within the cosmic web.

displayProperties.description: Return to Quinn to discuss the next steps.
displayProperties.name: Bluejay

setData.questStepSummary:
"Bluejay's files are a mess! Why are creative types like this?! Anyway, I've finally sifted through and found a lead for us. Come see me."
—Quinn

displayProperties.description: Visit the archivist.
displayProperties.name: Strider

displayProperties.description: Spend keys on a Terminal Overload Key Chest in each of the three different areas of Neomuna.
displayProperties.name: Strider

setData.questStepSummary:
"The Strider would never leave Neomuna's citizens at risk. If you're going to bond with her, you need to fight on every front!"
—Quinn

displayProperties.description: Defeat Shadow Legion forces in Neomuna to find location data, and dive into the Ahimsa Park Lost Sector for a data cipher to put the data together.
displayProperties.name: Strider

setData.questStepSummary:
"The Vex are coming for the Occlusion! The Shadow Legion know where they are. Does everyone know more about this than me?! Time to fix that!"
—Quinn

displayProperties.description: The archivist wants to discuss your findings.
displayProperties.name: Strider

setData.questStepSummary:
"This Shadow Legion tracking data is all over the place, but I've got a more sophisticated system back here at my desk. Bring it back to me, yeah?"
—Quinn

displayProperties.description: Approach Strider's memorial to repair it.
displayProperties.name: Strider

setData.questStepSummary: A Strider pushes forward toward their goal no matter what may block their path. You can feel this Cloud Strider's legacy within the cosmic web.

displayProperties.description: Destroy the Hydras and shut down the confluxes at Maya's Retreat.
displayProperties.name: Strider

setData.questStepSummary:
"If the Vex get a foothold in Maya's Retreat, they'll be impossible to get out again, and the next step is the CloudArk. We can't let them get anywhere near the Occlusion—you have to stop them!"
—Quinn

displayProperties.description: The archivist has a reward for you.
displayProperties.name: Strider

setData.questStepSummary: The archivist has the authority to hand out artifacts from Neomuna's history when she knows they'll be used in the city's best interest. And there's some intriguing data…

displayProperties.description: Explore the Hall of Heroes audio tour.
displayProperties.name: Welcome to the Hall of Heroes

setData.questLineName: Welcome to the Hall of Heroes
setData.questStepSummary: Quinn needs a few minutes to resolve her computer problems. Take the Hall of Heroes audio tour while you wait.

displayProperties.description: Visit the damaged memorials to learn more about them and see what data can be salvaged.
displayProperties.name: Welcome to the Hall of Heroes

setData.questLineName: Welcome to the Hall of Heroes
setData.questStepSummary: Neomuna's sacred archive, the Hall of Heroes, has been attacked and the Archivist wants your help.

displayProperties.description: Scan the remaining damaged memorial to see what data can be salvaged.
displayProperties.name: Welcome to the Hall of Heroes

setData.questLineName: Welcome to the Hall of Heroes
setData.questStepSummary: Attackers destroyed several of Neomuna's sacred memorials, but maybe something can be salvaged.

displayProperties.description: The Archivist wants to discuss your new use for Strand.
displayProperties.name: Welcome to the Hall of Heroes

setData.questLineName: Welcome to the Hall of Heroes
setData.questStepSummary: This new manifestation of your Strand powers might be exactly what the Archivist needs to solve her mystery.

displayProperties.description: Go to the Hall of Heroes.
displayProperties.name: Unfinished Business

setData.questStepSummary: Crowds of holograms are gathering at the Hall of Heroes. It's time for Rohan's core to be included among the memorialized Cloud Striders who came before him, and Nimbus would like your company at the ceremony.

displayProperties.description: Visit Nimbus to find out why they left Rohan's induction ceremony early.
displayProperties.name: Unfinished Business

setData.questStepSummary: Nimbus clearly had something on their mind when they left Rohan's induction ceremony. Talk to the Cloud Strider to find out what.

displayProperties.description: Collect cipher qubits from the Vex and use them to extract Rohan's data from Cloud Accretions in Neomuna.
displayProperties.name: Unfinished Business

setData.questStepSummary:
Collect cipher qubits from the Vex and use them to extract Rohan's data from Cloud Accretions in Neomuna.

One data extraction costs 8 cipher qubits.

displayProperties.description: Locate the final data packet in Maya's Retreat.
displayProperties.name: Unfinished Business

setData.questStepSummary: Ghost has traced the last of the encrypted data packets to Maya's Retreat. Head there to recover it and complete Rohan's notes.

displayProperties.description: Survive the Vex attack and recover the data packet from their conflux.
displayProperties.name: Unfinished Business

setData.questStepSummary: Ghost has pinpointed the final data packet in Maya's Retreat, but the Vex aren't taking too kindly to any interference with their conflux. Survive the Vex attack and recover the data packet.

displayProperties.description: Regroup with Nimbus and Osiris in Radiosonde to find out what was in Rohan's notes.
displayProperties.name: Unfinished Business

setData.questStepSummary: Nimbus has recruited Osiris's help with decrypting Rohan's notes. Regroup with them to find out what was in Rohan's notes and decide next steps.

displayProperties.description: Retrieve a Vex compass from the Lost Sector in Límíng Harbor.
displayProperties.name: Unfinished Business

setData.questStepSummary: Rohan's notes revealed that not only had he entered the Black Garden, but also he devised a passkey to return. To start, you will need a Vex compass.

displayProperties.description: Create chaos in Ahimsa Park to draw Shadow Legion forces away from Calus's ship. The more you use your abilities to defeat combatants, the more mayhem you create.
displayProperties.name: Unfinished Business

setData.questStepSummary: The other component of the passkey is in Calus's ship. Create chaos in Ahimsa Park to draw out Shadow Legion forces. Ability final blows amp up the mayhem.

displayProperties.description: The passkey's other component is a Seed of Silver Wings. One can be found in Calus's trove deep within the Typhon Imperator.
displayProperties.name: Unfinished Business

setData.questStepSummary: Rohan's notes call for a "starting seed." Osiris interprets this as a Seed of Silver Wings. One can be found in Calus's trove in the Typhon Imperator.

displayProperties.description: Return to Nimbus in Striders' Gate to build the passkey.
displayProperties.name: Unfinished Business

setData.questStepSummary: You have the necessary components. Soon you'll have a passkey to the Black Garden. Return to Nimbus in Striders' Gate.

displayProperties.description: Complete the mission "What Remains."
displayProperties.name: Unfinished Business

setData.questStepSummary: The Conceptual Mind is your best shot at unlocking the Veil. Use Rohan's passkey to enter the Black Garden to claim its memory core.

displayProperties.description: Bring the Conceptual Mind's memory core to Nimbus in Striders' Gate.
displayProperties.name: Unfinished Business

setData.questStepSummary: Nimbus will be glad to hear about your success in the Black Garden. Bring the Conceptual Mind's memory core to them in Striders' Gate.

displayProperties.description: Go to the Hall of Heroes to honor those who cut their years short for the sake of humanity.
displayProperties.name: Unfinished Business

setData.questStepSummary: Go to the Hall of Heroes to honor those who cut their years short for the sake of humanity.

displayProperties.description: Visit Nimbus in Striders' Gate in Neomuna.
displayProperties.name: The Final Strand

setData.questLineDescription: Advance your Strand mastery by learning how to incorporate it into your weaponry.
setData.questStepSummary: Visit Nimbus in Striders' Gate to discuss incorporating Strand energy into a weapon.

displayProperties.description: Search for Strand-inoculated gadgets in Veil Containment in Neomuna.
displayProperties.name: The Final Strand

setData.questLineDescription: Advance your Strand mastery by learning how to incorporate it into your weaponry.
setData.questStepSummary: Search Veil Containment for the atmospheric Veil spectrometer developed by Neomuni scientists.

displayProperties.description: Defeat the Shadow Legion looters and read their orders to learn where they took the spoils.
displayProperties.name: The Final Strand

setData.questLineDescription: Advance your Strand mastery by learning how to incorporate it into your weaponry.
setData.questStepSummary: This Shadow Legion squad has been looting the Irkalla Institute for Veil-related equipment. Read their orders to learn where they took the spoils.

displayProperties.description: Retrieve the Veil spectrometer from the Typhon Imperator.
displayProperties.name: The Final Strand

setData.questLineDescription: Advance your Strand mastery by learning how to incorporate it into your weaponry.
setData.questStepSummary: The Shadow Legion looted valuable equipment from the Irkalla Institute. Retrieve the atmospheric Veil spectrometer from the Typhon Imperator.

displayProperties.description: Visit the Pouka Pond in the Hall of Heroes in Neomuna.
displayProperties.name: The Final Strand

setData.questLineDescription: Advance your Strand mastery by learning how to incorporate it into your weaponry.
setData.questStepSummary: With the Veil spectrometer safely in hand, return to the Pouka Pond to meditate on how to retrofit it into a Strand weapon.

displayProperties.description: Complete Osiris's training program in Radiosonde in at least 5 minutes 30 seconds to retune the Veil spectrometer.
displayProperties.name: The Final Strand

setData.questLineDescription: Advance your Strand mastery by learning how to incorporate it into your weaponry.
setData.questStepSummary: To weaponize the Veil spectrometer, you must retune its Strand vibrations. Complete Osiris's training program in at least 5 minutes 30 seconds to hit the right tempo.

displayProperties.description: Visit the Pouka Pond in the Hall of Heroes to finish your Strand weapon.
displayProperties.name: The Final Strand

setData.questLineDescription: Advance your Strand mastery by learning how to incorporate it into your weaponry.
setData.questStepSummary:
After retuning the spectrometer, you find a Neomuni nanite cartridge. Just what you need to complete this project.

Return to the Pouka Pond to build your new weapon.

displayProperties.description: Retrieve supply caches from region chests  in Neomuna.
displayProperties.name: From Zero…

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Earn reputation by participating in public events, completing patrols, and looting resources.

setData.questLineDescription: Help Nimbus and the people of Neomuna.
setData.questStepSummary: "There's supply caches scattered across the city, but our enemies can break into 'em too. As long as they stay out of Shadow Legion and Vex hands, they're all yours." —Nimbus

displayProperties.description: Work with the Neomuni people to defend the city by completing patrols and public events, and bolster their supplies by gathering resource nodes and chests.
displayProperties.name: From Zero…

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Earn reputation by participating in public events, completing patrols, and looting resources.

setData.questLineDescription: Help Nimbus and the people of Neomuna.
setData.questStepSummary: "People here have been hearing scary stories about Earth Warlords since they were kids. Changing minds isn't easy, but every bit helps." —Nimbus

displayProperties.description: Travel to Esi Terminal and defeat Shadow Legionary Trask.
displayProperties.name: From Zero…

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Earn reputation by participating in public events, completing patrols, and looting resources.

setData.questLineDescription: Help Nimbus and the people of Neomuna.
setData.questStepSummary: "Esi Terminal's getting hammered by some Shadow Legion tough guy, name of Tusk—no, Trask. Take him out, and the patrollers will be singing your praises!" —Nimbus

displayProperties.description: Return to Nimbus.
displayProperties.name: From Zero…

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Earn reputation by participating in public events, completing patrols, and looting resources.

setData.questLineDescription: Help Nimbus and the people of Neomuna.
setData.questStepSummary: You've helped the people of Neomuna defend their city, at least for now. Nimbus will want to hear about this.

displayProperties.description: Retrieve the remaining supply caches from region chests  in Neomuna.
displayProperties.name: …To Hero

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Earn reputation by participating in public events, completing patrols, and looting resources.

setData.questLineDescription: Help Nimbus and the people of Neomuna.
setData.questStepSummary: "Scavengers are picking the city clean. If you find any more supply caches, grab 'em before the Shadow Legion or Vex do, all right?" —Nimbus

displayProperties.description: Work with the Neomuni people to defend the city by completing patrols and public events, and bolster their supplies by gathering resource nodes and chests.
displayProperties.name: …To Hero

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Earn reputation by participating in public events, completing patrols, and looting resources.

setData.questLineDescription: Help Nimbus and the people of Neomuna.
setData.questStepSummary: "If you're looking to help out, there's no shortage of work. We could use extra hands just about everywhere right now." —Nimbus

displayProperties.description: Travel to the Typhon Imperator, sabotage Shadow Legion supplies, and defeat Shadow Legionary Gha'ram.
displayProperties.name: …To Hero

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Earn reputation by participating in public events, completing patrols, and looting resources.

setData.questLineDescription: Help Nimbus and the people of Neomuna.
setData.questStepSummary: "Taking out Shadow Legion invaders isn't enough. We gotta hit them where it hurts: their supplies. Board the Typhon Imperator, blow up their stuff, and see if you can flush any officers out." —Nimbus

displayProperties.description: Return to Nimbus.
displayProperties.name: …To Hero

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Earn reputation by participating in public events, completing patrols, and looting resources.

setData.questLineDescription: Help Nimbus and the people of Neomuna.
setData.questStepSummary: You've helped the people of Neomuna defend their city for another day. Nimbus will want to hear about this.

displayProperties.description: Gain data to support the nanite calibration by rapidly defeating combatants in Neomuna with Auto Rifles, grenades, and any Grenade Launchers. Rapidly defeating combatants with Grenade Launchers grants the most progress.
displayProperties.name: Any Data Port in a Storm

setData.questLineName: Any Data Port in a Storm
setData.questStepSummary: Teach your rifle's embedded nanite colony about this Guardian weapon it now inhabits by putting it through its many paces.

displayProperties.description: Go visit Banshee-44 in the Tower to see what he has to say about Quicksilver Storm's progress.
displayProperties.name: Any Data Port in a Storm

setData.questLineName: Any Data Port in a Storm
setData.questStepSummary: The calibrations you've put it through have certainly helped, but though Quicksilver Storm sings in your hands, something still seems unfinished. Better have an expert look at it.

displayProperties.description: Defeat combatants in Neomuna with the Grenade Launcher alternate fire mode of Quicksilver Storm.
displayProperties.name: Any Data Port in a Storm

setData.questLineName: Any Data Port in a Storm
setData.questStepSummary: You've taught Quicksilver Storm everything about how you handle a rifle. Time for one final stress test: High explosives!

displayProperties.description: Check on Osiris's data crawler for more information about the Veil's history.
displayProperties.name: Unveiled

setData.questStepSummary: The data crawler has been hard at work.

displayProperties.description: Return to the meditation table to obtain your next Strand Aspect.
displayProperties.name: Unveiled

setData.questStepSummary: Meditate on your deepened understanding of the Veil.

displayProperties.description: Complete the "Warlord's Ruin" dungeon in the EDZ.
displayProperties.name: In the Shadow of the Mountain

setData.questLineName: In the Shadow of the Mountain
setData.questLineDescription: Ikora wants you to rendezvous with Crow in the EDZ, and investigate rumors of Scorn activity.
setData.questStepSummary:
You were tasked with assisting Crow in investigating Scorn sightings near a ruined Dark Age castle in the EDZ.

[Datapad, summarized]
-Scorn Raider sighted in sector EDZ-R5
-Scorn Raiders, 5-7, sighted in sector EDZ-R4
-Taken migration from Sludge to sector EDZ-R
-Scorn Chieftain engaged in sector EDZ-R2, potential [redacted] in play, retreated into mountains
-External operative confirmed Dark Ether trail
-Guardian fireteam requested

displayProperties.description: Collect a corrupted Ahamkara Bone.
displayProperties.name: In the Shadow of the Mountain

3342537589.displaySource: Don't be afraid. Come a little closer.

setData.questLineName: In the Shadow of the Mountain
setData.questLineDescription: Ikora wants you to rendezvous with Crow in the EDZ, and investigate rumors of Scorn activity.
setData.questStepSummary: The remains of the Ahamkara beckon you forth…

displayProperties.description: Collect five Dark Ether Tinctures.
displayProperties.name: In the Shadow of the Mountain

528631697.displaySource: "See how they feed their totems blight and bone? They believe it worship. They believe this ground sacred. Their small desires feed my power. Feed… you, O vengeance mine." —Hefnd, Blighted in Vengeance

setData.questLineName: In the Shadow of the Mountain
setData.questLineDescription: Ikora wants you to rendezvous with Crow in the EDZ, and investigate rumors of Scorn activity.
setData.questStepSummary: Hefnd has tasked you with finding the first of his bones, stolen by wishful Scorn who believe the bones are sacred relics of power.

displayProperties.description:
Find and restore three lost Bones of Hefnd:
- First Bone: Across the bridge inside the first fort, before an arresting Knight assails you.
- Second Bone: Across from imprisonment, after ascending through the ceiling.
- Third Bone: At the top of the summit, face back from the cliff and find shelter.
displayProperties.name: In the Shadow of the Mountain

1248338443.displaySource: The Scorn carry my bones like relics. They worship, they pray, they form rituals. They place them on shrines to bring good fortunes, but with each wish made in ignorance, I dig their graves deeper." —Hefnd, Blighted in Vengeance

setData.questLineName: In the Shadow of the Mountain
setData.questLineDescription: Ikora wants you to rendezvous with Crow in the EDZ, and investigate rumors of Scorn activity.
setData.questStepSummary: Wish upon the Bones of Hefnd to unlock doors with a level 1 corruption and uncover more fragments.

displayProperties.description:
Find and restore three more lost Bones of Hefnd:
- Fourth Bone: In the snowfallen maze, through the broken wall, seek the banner of kings.
- Fifth Bone: Cross into the Tempest, through the portcullis, at the sewer's mouth.
- Sixth Bone: At summit's base, find shelter off the beaten path. Too far, and the Taken will descend upon you.
displayProperties.name: In the Shadow of the Mountain

4140478887.displaySource: "These vermin claim what is mine, again, as if to repeat the past. Soon it will be over. I can feel blight overtaking me, O vengeance mine. When judgement is had, you must end me as well." —Hefnd, Blighted in Vengeance

setData.questLineName: In the Shadow of the Mountain
setData.questLineDescription: Ikora wants you to rendezvous with Crow in the EDZ, and investigate rumors of Scorn activity.
setData.questStepSummary: Wish upon the Bones of Hefnd to unlock doors with a level 2 corruption and uncover more fragments.

displayProperties.description:
Find and restore the three final lost Bones of Hefnd:
- Seventh Bone: Within the maze, stride spanning a pitfall, light calls through the window.
- Eighth Bone: The Taken roil at cave's bottom sends you to scurry over boulders into a ruined alcove.
- Ninth Bone: Within a tunnel on the broken cliffs, brave the Taken storm.
displayProperties.name: In the Shadow of the Mountain

2965218580.displaySource: "I am soon-to-be whole again, and it brings my heart joy to see these rotted kings break against you. Enough of this sad world. All is soon to be well. I am coming to see you again, Naeem." —Hefnd, Blighted in Vengeance

setData.questLineName: In the Shadow of the Mountain
setData.questLineDescription: Ikora wants you to rendezvous with Crow in the EDZ, and investigate rumors of Scorn activity.
setData.questStepSummary: Wish upon Bones of Hefnd to unlock doors with a level 3 corruption and uncover more fragments.

displayProperties.description: Gather Blighted Wishing Glass and Dark Ether Tinctures to empower the portal in the Blighted Keep.
displayProperties.name: In the Shadow of the Mountain

867172810.displaySource: "One final task is yours. Gather what power remains in this ruined place, and open the way to my resting skull." — Hefnd, Vengeance Sated.

setData.questLineName: In the Shadow of the Mountain
setData.questLineDescription: Ikora wants you to rendezvous with Crow in the EDZ, and investigate rumors of Scorn activity.
setData.questStepSummary: Activate the teleporter.

displayProperties.description: Return to Hefnd's Cairn.
displayProperties.name: In the Shadow of the Mountain

825259733.displaySource: "Naeem's wish is fulfilled. Return my bones to where Naeem enshrined them, and let my spirit finally find rest." —Hefnd, Vengeance Sated

setData.questLineName: In the Shadow of the Mountain
setData.questLineDescription: Ikora wants you to rendezvous with Crow in the EDZ, and investigate rumors of Scorn activity.
setData.questStepSummary: The lost bone fragments have been recovered and restored. Return them to their owner, that they may be at peace.

displayProperties.description: Return to Ikora and report your findings.
displayProperties.name: In the Shadow of the Mountain

setData.questLineName: In the Shadow of the Mountain
setData.questLineDescription: Ikora wants you to rendezvous with Crow in the EDZ, and investigate rumors of Scorn activity.
setData.questStepSummary: With vengeance had, and the Scorn back in the ground, all that remains is to debrief with Ikora at the Bazaar in the Last City.

displayProperties.description: Defeat Taken combatants and collect their Taken Essences.
displayProperties.name: Whispers of the Taken I

setData.questStepSummary:
Eris Morn has a proposal to help you empower your rediscovered Whisper of the Worm.

She charges you with defeating combatants with the weapon and harvesting Taken Essences, thereby strengthening your connection to your memories.

displayProperties.description:
Destroy the first set of Taken Blights in Exotic mission "The Whisper" on Legend difficulty. 

Launch the mission from the "Into the Light" subscreen on your Director.
displayProperties.name: Whispers of the Taken I

setData.questStepSummary:
Eris Morn has a proposal to help you empower your rediscovered Whisper of the Worm.

She charges you with revisiting your investigation of the Taken anomaly beneath the surface of Io, and destroying the Blights you find there.

displayProperties.description:
Complete the Exotic mission "The Whisper" on Legend difficulty. 

Launch the mission from the "Into the Light" subscreen on your Director.
displayProperties.name: Whispers of the Taken I

setData.questStepSummary: With the Blights dealt with, you need only complete your journey through the Taken anomaly to imbue your Whisper of the Worm with additional power.

displayProperties.description: Return to Eris Morn on the Moon.
displayProperties.name: Whispers of the Taken I

setData.questStepSummary:
Eris Morn is now capable of manifesting your memories into a tangible improvement to your weapon. 

Return to her and reap the rewards of your efforts.

displayProperties.description: Defeat Taken combatants with Whisper of the Worm equipped and collect their Taken Essences.
displayProperties.name: Whispers of the Taken II

setData.questStepSummary:
Eris Morn has a proposal to help you empower your rediscovered Whisper of the Worm.

She charges you with defeating combatants with the weapon and harvesting Taken Essences, thereby strengthening your connection to your memories.

displayProperties.description:
Destroy the second set of Taken Blights in Exotic mission "The Whisper" on Legend difficulty. 

Launch the mission from the "Into the Light" subscreen on your Director.
displayProperties.name: Whispers of the Taken II

setData.questStepSummary:
Eris Morn has a proposal to help you empower your rediscovered Whisper of the Worm.

She charges you with revisiting your investigation of the Taken anomaly beneath the surface of Io, and destroying the Blights you find there.

displayProperties.description:
Complete the Exotic mission "The Whisper" on Legend difficulty. 

Launch the mission from the "Into the Light" subscreen on your Director.
displayProperties.name: Whispers of the Taken II

setData.questStepSummary: With the Blights dealt with, you need only complete your journey through the Taken anomaly to imbue your Whisper of the Worm with additional power.

displayProperties.description: Speak with Eris Morn on the Moon.
displayProperties.name: Whispers of the Taken II

setData.questStepSummary:
Eris Morn is now capable of manifesting your memories into a tangible improvement to your weapon. 

Return to her and reap the rewards of your efforts.

displayProperties.description: With Whisper of the Worm equipped, defeat Taken combatants with precision damage and collect their Taken Essences.
displayProperties.name: Whispers of the Taken III

setData.questStepSummary:
Eris Morn has a proposal to help you empower your rediscovered Whisper of the Worm.

She charges you with defeating Taken with the weapon using precision damage. 

Then harvest their Taken Essences, thereby strengthening your connection to your memories.

displayProperties.description:
Destroy the final set of Taken Blights in Exotic mission "The Whisper" on Legend difficulty. 

Launch the mission from the "Into the Light" subscreen on your Director.
displayProperties.name: Whispers of the Taken III

setData.questStepSummary:
Eris Morn has a proposal to help you empower your rediscovered Whisper of the Worm.

She charges you with revisiting your investigation of the Taken anomaly beneath the surface of Io, and destroying the Blights you find there.

displayProperties.description:
Complete the Exotic mission "The Whisper" on Legend difficulty. 

Launch the mission from the "Into the Light" subscreen on your Director.
displayProperties.name: Whispers of the Taken III

setData.questStepSummary: With the Blights dealt with, you need only complete your journey through the Taken anomaly to imbue your Whisper of the Worm with additional power.

displayProperties.description: Speak with Eris Morn on the Moon.
displayProperties.name: Whispers of the Taken III

setData.questStepSummary:
Eris Morn is now capable of manifesting your memories into a tangible improvement to your weapon. 

Return to her and reap the rewards of your efforts.

displayProperties.description:
Eris Morn has a proposal to help you prepare to face the forces of the Witness.

Visit Eris on the Moon to learn more.
displayProperties.name: Whispers of the Past

setData.questLineDescription:
Eris Morn has a proposal to help you prepare to face the forces of the Witness.

Visit Eris on the Moon to learn more.

displayProperties.description: Speak with Eris Morn on the Moon.
displayProperties.name: Whispers of the Taken I

displayProperties.description: Speak with Eris Morn on the Moon.
displayProperties.name: Whispers of the Taken II

displayProperties.description: Speak with Eris Morn on the Moon.
displayProperties.name: Whispers of the Taken III

displayProperties.description:
Complete the Exotic mission "The Whisper."

Launch the mission from the Legends subscreen in the Director.
displayProperties.name: Whispers of the Past

setData.questStepSummary:
Eris Morn has a proposal to help you prepare to face the forces of the Witness.

It begins by visiting a dark and violent memory: your investigation of a Taken anomaly deep beneath the surface of Io.

displayProperties.description: Return to Eris Morn on the Moon.
displayProperties.name: Whispers of the Past

setData.questStepSummary:
Harvest memories from your bygone investigation of a Taken anomaly beneath the surface of Io.

Eris will use her unique skills and your recollections to build and empower a renowned weapon from your past.

displayProperties.description:
Complete the Exotic mission "Zero Hour." 

Launch the mission from the Legends subscreen on your Director.
displayProperties.name: Asset Protection

setData.questStepSummary: Ada-1 requests that you run a simulation of the foiled Fallen heist in the Old Tower so that she can gather data to recreate an infamous weapon of the past.

displayProperties.description: Return to Ada-1 in the Tower Annex.
displayProperties.name: Asset Protection

setData.questStepSummary: Ada-1 can use the information gathered from your time in the simulation to recreate an infamous weapon of the past.

displayProperties.description: Defeat Fallen in the Cosmodrome to claim Inert SIVA Clusters.
displayProperties.name: Outbreak Refined I

setData.questStepSummary: Ada-1 can provide you with more build options for Outbreak if you bring her some Inert SIVA Clusters.

displayProperties.description: Toggle the first pair of switches in Exotic mission "Zero Hour" on Expert difficulty.
displayProperties.name: Outbreak Refined I

setData.questStepSummary: Ada-1 can provide you with more build options for you weapon if you fulfill specific conditions on your run through the heist simulation.

displayProperties.description: Complete the Exotic mission "Zero Hour" on Expert difficulty.
displayProperties.name: Outbreak Refined I

setData.questStepSummary: Complete your run of the advanced heist simulation to finalize the data Ada-1 needs.

displayProperties.description: Speak with Ada-1 in the Tower Annex.
displayProperties.name: Outbreak Refined I

displayProperties.description: Rebuild the Grand Overture's catalyst by defeating Cabal, defeating targets with Power weapons, and rapidly defeating targets.
displayProperties.name: Heavy Does It

3669113309.displaySource:
"Cabal tech is twice as thick as it needs to be, and three times as heavy. Get your hands on some Cabal tech to finish this rebuild."
—Banshee-44

setData.questLineDescription:
Banshee-44 has ideas on how to repair the broken catalyst for the Grand Overture Exotic Machine Gun. 

With your help, he can make it more potent than ever before.

displayProperties.description:
Calibrate data and defeat targets while using Grand Overture. 

Calibration occurs when you complete Vanguard Operations, Gambit and Crucible matches, or Seasonal playlist activities.

Higher-tier Nightfall completions, Crucible and Gambit wins, and defeating Guardians provide additional progress.
displayProperties.name: Heavy Does It

74310575.displaySource:
"Installation ain't the same as calibration. Give it a good workout before you rely on it."
—Banshee-44

setData.questLineDescription:
Banshee-44 has ideas on how to repair the broken catalyst for the Grand Overture Exotic Machine Gun. 

With your help, he can make it more potent than ever before.

displayProperties.description: Return to Banshee-44 to receive the calibrated catalyst.
displayProperties.name: Heavy Does It

setData.questLineDescription:
Banshee-44 has ideas on how to repair the broken catalyst for the Grand Overture Exotic Machine Gun. 

With your help, he can make it more potent than ever before.

displayProperties.description: Adjust Trespasser's retrofitted catalyst by defeating Fallen, defeating targets with Arc damage, and defeating targets with precision final blows.
displayProperties.name: No Trespassing

364003008.displaySource:
"What'd you drop on this? It'll need custom work… oh… right, hang on…" Banshee grumbles and pulls the pin back out of the frame.

It illuminates once more with a projection of Calus. "Your tribute is nearly complete. Now show me your skill. Your precision, in a shocking display with death-defying maneuvers. I'll be watching, and when I am pleased, so too will you be with your reward."

Banshee looks at you. "Simple enough."

setData.questLineDescription: Banshee-44 has a plan to retrofit a catalyst for Trespasser. With your assistance, he can make the necessary adjustments.

displayProperties.description:
Calibrate data and defeat targets while using Trespasser. 

Calibration occurs when you complete Vanguard Operations, Gambit and Crucible matches, or Seasonal playlist activities.

Higher-tier Nightfall completions, Crucible and Gambit wins, and defeating Guardians provide additional progress.
displayProperties.name: No Trespassing

4023822046.displaySource:
"What's this?" Banshee looks the weapon over for a few seconds without familiarity.

"It just needs calibration, not a smith. Take it out into the field and run the numbers."

setData.questLineDescription: Banshee-44 has a plan to retrofit a catalyst for Trespasser. With your assistance, he can make the necessary adjustments.

displayProperties.description: Return to Banshee-44 to receive the calibrated catalyst.
displayProperties.name: No Trespassing

setData.questLineDescription: Banshee-44 has a plan to retrofit a catalyst for Trespasser. With your assistance, he can make the necessary adjustments.

displayProperties.description:
Design the Delicate Tomb's catalyst by defeating targets with Energy slot weapons and defeating challenging combatants. 

Defeating minibosses, bosses, and Champions provides additional progress.

2927847132.displaySource: "I don't recognize those symbols… where'd you find that thing, anyway?" —Banshee-44

displayProperties.name: The Form of the Danger

1931939585.displaySource: "Now calibrate that gun, and I'll be able to make sure it shoots as good as it looks." —Banshee-44

displayProperties.description: Defeat Cabal in Neomuna to find Vex tracking data.
displayProperties.name: Parting the Veil

setData.questStepSummary: The Shadow Legion have been actively following Vex activity in Neomuna. See what they've found out.

displayProperties.description: Acquire Vex data from Maya's Retreat.
displayProperties.name: Parting the Veil

setData.questStepSummary: The Vex are searching for something in Maya's Retreat. You need more data to identify their target.

displayProperties.description: Acquire additional Vex data from the exterior of the Irkalla Complex.
displayProperties.name: Parting the Veil

setData.questStepSummary: The final data should be just outside the Irkalla Complex.

displayProperties.description: Complete "Parting the Veil."
displayProperties.name: Parting the Veil

setData.questStepSummary: The Vex are trying to tunnel into secure computers in Irkalla Complex. Time to find out what they are after.

displayProperties.description: Meditate on your findings.
displayProperties.name: Parting the Veil

setData.questStepSummary: Osiris left you a note at the meditation table.

displayProperties.description: Pick up your next Strand Aspect at the table.
displayProperties.name: Parting the Veil

setData.questStepSummary: Your furthered understanding of Strand allows for new avenues of expression.

Complete Vanguard or Exotic playlist activities, or win matches in Crucible or Gambit.

Extra progress is awarded for more challenging activities and for succeeding with clanmates.
displayProperties.name: Xenology

2125848607.displaySource: "The Nine simply wish to learn. I am the instrument, and you are the subject." —Xûr

Return and speak to Xûr.

You may hold a maximum of 5 Exotic Ciphers in your inventory.
